page.title: 16RECREATION IN THRESHFIELD
page.content: One of the most popular clubs in the area is the{Wharfedale Rugby Union {Football Club.}It caters for all age groups from under nine years. At the moment the{club}is trying to raise money for an{extension}to the {clubhouse.}Every month at{Threshfield {village Institute}there is a{Whist {Drive.}Monday and Friday nights there is a{Youth Club}attended by children over 13. There is also a local{Cricket pitch.}Here{Threshfield {cricket club}play other villages in the area like{Grassington, Burnsall, {Litton, Kettlewell, Cracoe}and{Linton. On Sundays{Wharfedale Cricket Club play. The{team}is selected from all the village teams.{Wharfedale}plays against other Dales teams. {Long Ashes}as well as being a caravan site also has a pool,sauna,squash courts and a weight training room.
